title: NFL Sunday Ticket Suit Moves Along (Podcast)
itunes:title: NFL Sunday Ticket Suit Moves Along (Podcast)
description:
Nothing against "Dancing With The Stars," but Monday Night Football needs to return to network television. At least if you ask Michael Barr. He's joined by Jason Kelly and Mike Lynch for a wide-ranging chat around NFL ratings, NY Mets ownership, and the Wynn Resorts-NASCAR betting partnership. They also discuss the Supreme Court's refusal to stop an antitrust suit against the NFL and DirecTV over the cost of Sunday Ticket package of out-of-market football games.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
